body:
## Release Notes

- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#44)
- Catch lexer error and print a nicer error message. @iphydf (#43)
- Fix install-deps for OSX bash. @iphydf (#41)
- Fix quotes in CSS selector. @iphydf (#42)
- Pass --no-backup to the correct opam setup program. @iphydf (#40)
- Distinguish between error and OK in API response. @iphydf (#39)
- Add a web endpoint for apidsl. @iphydf (#38)
- Add back coveralls support. @iphydf (#37)
- Migrate to dune build system; disable coverage for now. @iphydf (#36)
- Enable .travis.yml check and use non-markdown license. @iphydf (#34)
- Relicense under GPLv3. @iphydf (#33)
- Initial version of Haskell backend @iphydf (#18)
- Use official markdown license for AGPLv3. @iphydf (#32)
- Don't use `git.depth=1` anymore. @iphydf (#30)
- Fix Dockerfile @nurupo (#24)
- Add travis build for the docker image building. @iphydf (#23)
- Update tox.api.h and add replaceDecl test. @iphydf (#19)
- Add Docker instructions @nurupo (#22)
- Re-run oasis setup to update build system. @iphydf (#21)
- Only fetch 1 revision from git during Travis builds. @iphydf (#20)
- Reverse the diff direction in tests. @iphydf (#17)
- Improve error diagnostics a bit. @iphydf (#16)
- Correctly order decls in `ReplaceDecl`. @iphydf (#15)
- Reorder arguments to SymbolTable.rename. @iphydf (#9)
- Make ApiCodegen module parameterised on c_mode. @iphydf (#11)
- Add a NONE=0 enumerator to bitmask enums. @iphydf (#13)
- Add reference data for naked_typedef test. @iphydf (#14)
- Add support for typedef functions outside events. @iphydf (#12)
- Add test for parameter references. @iphydf (#8)
- Rename test files and add expected Haskell output. @iphydf (#7)
- Add coverage reporting. @iphydf (#5)

## ðŸ§° Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Add GitHub CI build named "build" to required status checks. @iphydf (#50)
- Enable coveralls on GitHub Actions. @iphydf (#49)
- Fix build on GitHub Actions. @iphydf (#47)
- Replace Travis CI with GitHub Actions. @iphydf (#46)
